lead_paragraph: The New England Revolution has rolled into the Major League Soccer final for the third time in five years, with the hope that today’s championship game at Pizza Hut Park in Frisco, Tex., against the Houston Dynamo will finally bring it a title. New England lost the 2002 and 2005 title games to Los Angeles.
